thread.title: Watch: Group of Siberian tigers take down drone in China - UPI.com
thread.title_full: Watch: Group of Siberian tigers take down drone in China - UPI.com

author: upi.com
title: Watch: Group of Siberian tigers take down drone in China - UPI.com
text:
Feb. 23 (UPI) -- A group of Siberian tigers swatted down and destroyed a drone at a wildlife habitat in China.
Footage shared by CCTV shows the hefty tigers chasing down the the floating piece of tech used to encourage the animals to exercise.
The drone led the tigers through the snow until one managed to land a massive paw on the device and swat it to the ground.
After getting ahold of the drone, the tigers began to rip apart their strange prey until it began smoking and scared them away.
Staff members later drove a protected vehicle over to the area to pick up the remains of the destroyed drone.
